contextId.information: "take one of the three piles of hair" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_fraction]])
contextId.quote: take a third of the hair

contextId.information: "let the wind blow the last third of your hair in different directions" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_fraction]])
contextId.quote: scatter a third of it to the wind
